languages.text: "Как?" {n}Соломон эхом повторяет ваши слова, и на его губы ложится подобие мрачной усмешки.{/n} "Если коротко — Схола Прогениум. Но такой ответ вряд ли вас устроит. Мой отец был Арбитес, и весьма хорошим. Иначе бы его не нашли в переулке, изрешеченного пулями. Сослуживец отца сказал, что его убили из десяти разных оружий, и что минимум четверых ублюдков он успел забрать с собой".

"How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."
languages.original_text: "Как?" {n}Соломон эхом повторяет ваши слова, и на его губы ложится подобие мрачной усмешки.{/n} "Если коротко — Схола Прогениум. Но такой ответ вряд ли вас устроит. languages.text: 「どうやって？」{n}ソロモーンは苦笑しながら繰り返した。{/n}「簡単に言えば、帝国教導院でなりました。ですが、それだけでは納得しないでしょうね。父がアービトレイターだったんです。優秀な人物でした。そうでなければ、路地裏で銃弾まみれになって見つかることはなかったはずですから。父と共に任務にあたっていた人物が言っていました。父は10種類もの武器で撃たれましたが、少なくとも4人のろくでなしを道連れにしたそうです」
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやって？」{n}ソロモーンは苦笑しながら繰り返した。{/n}「簡単に言えば、帝国教導院でなりました。ですが、それだけでは納得しないでしょうね。父がアービトレイターだったんです。優秀な人物でした。そうでなければ、路地裏で銃弾まみれになって見つかることはなかったはずですから。父と共に任務にあたっていた人物が言っていました。父は10種類もの武器で撃たれましたが、少なくとも4人のろくでなしを道連れにしたそうです」

languages.text: "Wie?" {n}Solomorne wiederholt das Wort mit einem grimmigen Lächeln.{/n} "Die Kurzfassung lautet: durch die Schola Progenium. Aber das dürfte Euch kaum zufriedenstellen. Mein Vater war ein Arbitrator. Ein guter – sonst hätten sie ihn auch nicht voller Kugeln in einer Gasse gefunden. Jemand, der mit meinem Vater gedient hatte, erzählte mir, dass er mit zehn verschiedenen Waffen getötet worden war und mindestens vier der Mistkerle mit in den Tod genommen hatte."
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."

traits.locale_text: "Wie?" {n}Solomorne wiederholt das Wort mit einem grimmigen Lächeln.{/n} "Die Kurzfassung lautet: durch die Schola Progenium. Aber das dürfte Euch kaum zufriedenstellen. Mein Vater war ein Arbitrator. Ein guter – sonst hätten sie ihn auch nicht voller Kugeln in einer Gasse gefunden. Jemand, der mit meinem Vater gedient hatte, erzählte mir, dass er mit zehn verschiedenen Waffen getötet worden war und mindestens vier der Mistkerle mit in den Tod genommen hatte."

languages.text: « Comment ? {n}Solomorne répète votre question tandis que ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire morne.{/n} La réponse courte est : en étudiant à la Schola Progenium. Mais j'imagine que ce n'était pas le sens de votre question. Mon père était arbitrator. Et particulièrement doué. Si ce n'avait pas été le cas, on ne l'aurait pas retrouvé dans une ruelle, le corps criblé de balles. L'un de ses camarades m'a rapporté qu'ils ont trouvé dix types de munitions différentes dans sa dépouille et qu'il a emporté avec lui au moins quatre de ces ordures. »
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? {n}Solomorne répète votre question tandis que ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire morne.{/n} La réponse courte est : en étudiant à la Schola Progenium. Mais j'imagine que ce n'était pas le sens de votre question. Mon père était arbitrator. Et particulièrement doué. Si ce n'avait pas été le cas, on ne l'aurait pas retrouvé dans une ruelle, le corps criblé de balles. L'un de ses camarades m'a rapporté qu'ils ont trouvé dix types de munitions différentes dans sa dépouille et qu'il a emporté avec lui au moins quatre de ces ordures. »

languages.text: «¿Cómo?». {n}Solomorne repite la palabra con una sonrisa torva.{/n} «La respuesta corta es: en la Schola Progenium. Pero dudo que le satisfaga. Mi padre era Arbitrator. Y de los buenos, o de lo contrario no habría aparecido cosido a balazos en un callejón. Uno de sus compañeros me contó que le habían disparado con diez armas distintas y que murió llevándose por delante al menos a cuatro de aquellos bastardos».
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo?». {n}Solomorne repite la palabra con una sonrisa torva.{/n} «La respuesta corta es: en la Schola Progenium. Pero dudo que le satisfaga. Mi padre era Arbitrator. Y de los buenos, o de lo contrario no habría aparecido cosido a balazos en un callejón. Uno de sus compañeros me contó que le habían disparado con diez armas distintas y que murió llevándose por delante al menos a cuatro de aquellos bastardos».

languages.text: “怎么成为的？”{n}索罗蒙脸上带着严峻的笑容，重复着这句话。{/n}“最简单的答案就是‘忠嗣学院’这四个字，但这个答案恐怕无法让你满意。我父亲生前是位法务官，而且尽忠职守，否则他就不会倒在那个小巷子里，身上满是弹孔了。和我父亲一起服役的同事告诉我，说当时他遭到了十几种不同武器的袭击，而他在临死前至少带走了四个人渣。”
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."

traits.locale_text: “怎么成为的？”{n}索罗蒙脸上带着严峻的笑容，重复着这句话。{/n}“最简单的答案就是‘忠嗣学院’这四个字，但这个答案恐怕无法让你满意。我父亲生前是位法务官，而且尽忠职守，否则他就不会倒在那个小巷子里，身上满是弹孔了。和我父亲一起服役的同事告诉我，说当时他遭到了十几种不同武器的袭击，而他在临死前至少带走了四个人渣。”

languages.text: "Nasıl mı?" {n}Solomorne, kelimeyi sert bir gülümsemeyle tekrarlıyor.{/n} "Buna verilebilecek en kısa cevap, Schola Progenium. Ancak bu yanıtın sizi tatmin edebileceğinden şüpheliyim. Babam bir Yargıcı'ydı. İyi biriydi. Yoksa bir ara sokakta delik deşik edilmiş hâlde bulunmazdı. Babamla birlikte görev yapan biri, onun on farklı silahla vurulduğunu ve en az dört pisliği de yanında götürdüğünü söylemişti."
languages.original_text: "How?" {n}Solomorne echoes the word with a grim smile.{/n} "The short answer is: the Schola Progenium. But I doubt you'd be satisfied with that. My father was an Arbitrator. A good one — or else they wouldn't have found him in an alley, filled with bullet holes. Someone who served with my father told me he was shot with ten different weapons and that he took at least four of the bastards down with him."
